name: TalkingTrump
0:
”Alexa open talking trump”
”Alexa ask talking trump to check your twitter”
”Alexa ask talking trump to say I am a stable genius and the chosen one.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: talking trump
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Be amazed as Trump himself repeats anything you want him to. You can also ask him to check his twitter.

An AI-generated voice of the President Donald Trump will speak anything you say, by prompting him to 'Say ....' or 'Repeat after me ....'. 

Premium Experience
================

- Removes the one usage per day limit.
- Allows you to 'shortcut' anything you have had Trump say. 

Disclaimer
========

This skill is not affiliated to Donald Trump in any way. It is a novelty parody skill and the voices are based upon a parody generated using machine learning. Images of Trump used in the skill are public domain.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
